TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlQueryRuntime extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods and properties to support the XSLT processor.

.method public hidebysig instance bool IsQNameEqual(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator n1, class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator n2) cil managed

Docs.summary: Compares the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> properties of two instances to check if they are equal.
Docs.returns: if the names are equal; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsQNameEqual (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator, int indexLocalName, int indexNamespaceUri);
.method public hidebysig instance bool IsQNameEqual(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator, int32 indexLocalName, int32 indexNamespaceUri) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> properties of the specified are equal to the names specified in the parameters.
Docs.returns: if the names are equal; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The IsQNameEqual method calls the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlQueryRuntime.GetAtomizedName%2A> method to get the local name and the namespace URI based on the `indexLocalName` and `indexNamespaceUri`.
